description:

Then I go and edit the video and just like a Football slo-mo replay, I am like, "I don't think a single drop went in his mouth!" What the heck was he talking about eating another dude's cum?

Next time I am wiring his mouth open.
I know some of you like it when I do these Serviced videos, but it's nice to take a break and watch the other guy's skill grow! I am just trying find a balance to keep everyone happy.
title: Ramsey & Ransom - Serviced
